editorialNotes.standard: It took less than a minute for us to get hooked on this series all over again. The sequel to Rovioâs blockbuster puzzler polishes the feathery fun to a golden sheenâand with more than just beautiful new graphics. Features like multi-stage levels, pig-punishing spells and choosing the order in which you fling birds make the game more irresistible than ever. Whether itâs your first Angry Birds game or your 10th, youâll be flying high in no time.

editorialNotes.standard: Hipster Whale's Apple Design Awardâwinning game takes a timeless arcade formulaâcross a road bustling with traffic and deadly obstaclesâand transforms it into an adorable infinite runner. As you progress, youâll unlock new characters with wildly diverse looks and effects. Thereâs a teeny-tiny flea, an emo goose, and even a few characters from other gamesâlike Epoch, who sprays cars with blocky bullets. The creativity and care put into Crossy Roadâs wacky world are unmistakable.
Crack the case of a missing teenager using clues hidden in her phone in this suspenseful mystery.
